ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 66
ygData.msgSnippet: Why does twinking bother you so much? You make a valid point that it spoils the game for the guy who twinked his character - I mean he has nothing to look
ygData.messageBody:
Why does twinking bother you so much?
You make a valid point that it spoils the game for the guy who twinked his
character - I mean he has nothing to look forward to but weeks of
pwerlevelling his guy to levle 50...
But how does it affect you or your enjoyment of the game?
Coluld it be it makes you jealous?

I dont twink myself but I have no
problem with twinkers. Let them twink! How does that affect my
play/enjoyment? Express anger/resentment at peopl who twink and those who
allow themselves to be twinked. By this you are implying that if someone
were to offer you a haste sash and 2 serpentine bracers you would turn
them down (Nay, you would curse them out for trying to twink you!).

Personally if someone offered me all that great stuff I would accept it
happily and be thankfull to them. So suppose my level 30 monk were to be
walking around decked out in level 45-50 gear would your everquest gaming
expereince be affected in teh least?



> From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
>
> i don't be caring how *hic* much you hunted mammoths. By your 22nd yeer
> you still *burp* canna afford an exe hood, serpentine bracers and hav
> mutliple black pearls....unless yer twinked or yer *hic* guild twinked the
> mudder loving hell out a ya. Still either way....it's a friggin shame
> that peepol twink themselves or allow themselves to be *burp* twinked.
>
> Sligo
> Cazic Thule
>
> p.s. ill say this in plain ole english...not drunk speek. I saw a
> 17-19th level SK hunting in Oasis. Full suit of rubi/carnal armor.
> Purity Belt, Dark Reaver, BP Choker, Plantinum Silver Ruby Veil, Dwarven
> Work Boots and a White Wolf Hide Cloak. Whats the fun at that
> point...when everything you want for your character you already have.
> There is just no point. I wish twinking was a bannable offense.
>
>
